title: Wright Brothers
alt: I'm not sure if this is actually true.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are talking to each other.]
Cueball: I've heard that when the Wright brothers argued, they periodically switched sides in the debate to try to encourage a more balanced conclusion.
Cueball: We should try that in our relationship!Megan: It's a neat idea, but I think treating personal issues like a debate will only engender hostility and hurt feelings.Cueball: No, I think it would help, by forcing us to consider the other person's point of view.Megan: Hmm, maybe you're right.
Cueball: Am not. It's a bad idea.
